comments.text:
Yes, already tried to troubleshoot. I uninstalled FireFox version 4 and will not use, corrected the issue immediately.

Exact steps:
I signed into my Fastmail Account
Clicked Respond to a message
Senders message was deleted
Signature line and Logo, mine, gone
Logged off, logged back on and tried again
This time could not even compose a message or respond to a message
Fastmail has been notified as well and sent a screen shot
Other Fastmail issues have appeared on the Mozilla site since the move to 4
I guarantee you as much as I have valued FireFox I will not move to 4 and if version 3 goes away I will look for another browser since I cannot run this risk with my professional email.
Thanks....
